segments.text: I ’ Ve got this really neat idea , you can hire a car and drive straight there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you nuts ? What would my friends think if they see me in a hired car ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But that ’ s the quickest way to make your plans work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh this is hard ! Well , I ’ ll see what I can do .
segments.speaker: S2
